effect.sword_shield: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect.legends_arceus: Heals the target for ½ its max HP. If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.

short_effect.sword_shield: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
